about_section.heading: who_i_am
paras: I’m Harsh Prajapati — a self-driven web developer focused on building high-quality digital products.

I specialize in transforming ideas into fast, responsive, and thoughtfully engineered interfaces. With a strong foundation in frontend development and growing full-stack expertise, I enjoy solving real-world problems through clean code and modern design systems.
